changes.text: Theme system with new light/dark themes and font customization
Grid font size setting for data tables
Column visibility, reordering, and resizing (persisted per user or globally)
Auto-update containers with per-environment checks, batch updates, and vulnerability blocking
Stack improvements: environment variables management and .env file support for git stacks
Visual graph editor for Docker Compose stacks
Timezone support for scheduled tasks
Improved schedule execution history
Fix duplicate ports in expanded stack containers (IPv4/IPv6)

Fix null ports crash for Docker Desktop containers
Fix header layout overlap on small screens
Fix TLS/mTLS support for remote Docker hosts
Fix memory leaks (setTimeout cleanup, stream requests)
Fix Edge mode connection issues
Fix stack deletion with orphaned records

Many other minor bug fixes and improvements
Fix infinite toast loop when environment is offline
Fix stack git repository selection
Public IP field for environment config (container port clickable links)
Releases are now also published with 'latest' tag
Server-side auth enforcement fix
Docker production build dependencies fix
Memory metrics calculation for remote Docker hosts
Dashboard memory calculation (sum all containers memory usage)
Form validation errors and error messages readability in dark theme
First public release of Dockhand
Real-time container management (start, stop, restart, remove)

Docker Compose stack management with visual editor

Image management and registry browsing
Vulnerability scanning with Grype and Trivy
Container logs viewer with ANSI color rendering and auto-refresh
Interactive shell terminal with xterm.js
File browser for containers and volumes
Multi-environment support (local and remote Docker hosts)

Network and volume management

Authentication with OIDC/SSO and local users

Notification channels (SMTP, Apprise webhooks)
